about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a final-year student pursuing a bachelor's degree in business information technology, passionate about web and mobile application development. My academic journey has allowed me to develop strong skills in programming, data analysis, and project management. I enjoy tackling technical challenges and designing innovative solutions, especially using modern technologies.
about.education: 2022 - 2025: Bachelor's degree in Business Information Technology at [your university name]
about.experience: Internship in web application development, where I worked with technologies such as Java, JavaScript and React.
about.projects: Participation in various university projects, including the creation of websites and mobile applications for mock clients.
interestsList: Passionate about emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning.
